DOC.brief_summary: To describe plasma urinary pharmacokinetics quercetin glucuronide kaempferol glucuronide administration single peroral dose 1,800mg Red Vine Leaf Extract ( Antistax® ) . Additionally , trial evaluate safety tolerability dose healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetics Single Oral Dose 1,800 mg Red Vine Leaf Extract ( Antistax® )
